mapper.select: select t1.id id, t1.title title, DATE_FORMAT(t1.pubdate,'%Y-%m') yearStr, DATE_FORMAT(t1.pubdate,'%d') dayStr, t1.description description, t1.status status from jacg_weixin_queinvest t1 where status = '2' and t1.id not in (select queinvestId from jacg_weixin_answers where user_id =#{userPhone}) and t1.del !=1 and t1.valid > now()

select t0.id queinvestId, t0.title title, t2.id questionId, t2.contents contents
from (select t1.*,qq.questions_id from jacg_weixin_queinvest_questions qq right join jacg_weixin_queinvest t1 on qq.queinvest_id = t1.id)as t0
left join jacg_weixin_questions t2 on t0.questions_id = t2.id left join jacg_weixin_options t3 on t2.id = t3.questions_id LEFT JOIN jacg_weixin_answers t4 on t2.id = t4.questions_id inner join (select @n:= 0) d
where #{str} in (t3.choiceText01,t3.choiceText02,t3.choiceText03,t3.choiceText04) and t2.id= #{queId} GROUP BY t2.id
mapper.insert:
insert into jacg_weixin_answers (id, queinvestId, answerOption, questions_id, user_id, name, answerTime
) VALUE ( #{id}, #{queinvestId}, #{optContext}, #{questionId}, #{userPhone}, #{userName}, now() )
